Name: pornvault
Overview: 💋 Manage your ever-growing porn collection. Using Vue & GraphQL
CAComment: There are some complications in getting this app to work. See HERE for more information. This app *may* eventually be removed from CA due to this

configdirectory.Name: Config directory
configdirectory.Description: Directory for persistent files (config file, database, backups...)

imagesimportdirectory.Name: Images import directory
imagesimportdirectory.Description: Images stored here will be shown in the WebUI under 'Images'

videosimportdirectory.Name: Videos import directory
videosimportdirectory.Description: Videos stored here will be shown in the WebUI under 'Scenes'

uploadedimagesdirectory.Name: Uploaded images directory
uploadedimagesdirectory.Description: Images added through the WebUI are stored here. By default this is inside the config directory

webuiport.Name: WebUI port
webuiport.Description: The port for the porn-vault webinterface
